I have no idea what you're trying to say. Maybe edit this post or something? Looks like autocorrect did something wrong.

That's a good idea, I also would like to see kind of upgrades for the shield, like with an ancient kind of ocelot skin, but instead of being obtained by the animal itself, it would be founded in structures, like jungle trail ruins, and an enchantment that could make the shield sound like the famous "aztec ocarina" when fighting with illagers, undead and other mobs in any kind of jungle, in mangrove swamps, and in the new forest: the rainforest, also could be customised with ancient patterns founded in ruined structures like the armors.
They put 32 and 32 in different chest s

The Copper Golem is a great addition, but it needs some key improvements to be truly useful.
Right now, every time it picks a new item from the copper chest, it checks every regular chest one by one, without remembering where it already placed similar items. That‚Äôs because it has no memory.
Also, it should be able to detect the contents of nearby chests without having to open them, like scanning its surroundings. This would save a lot of time and make it much more efficient.
Finally, it should be able to open copper doors and trapdoors. If it‚Äôs inside a closed house, it gets stuck and can‚Äôt do its job.

üí° Suggestions:

Memory to remember where it placed similar items.

Ability to detect nearby chest contents instantly.

Capability to open copper doors and trapdoors.
Oh yess pls this would be so nice

I think copper item frames could tell copper golems to sort a specific group of items, for example, a stone block could tell copper golems to sort all natural blocks into that chest. A normal item frame could tell copper golems to sort that specific item into a chest.
Und die Kupfergolems sollten nicht miteinander kollidieren k√∂nnen da es in der aktuellen Version so nur schwer m√∂glich ist, ein effizientes automatisches Lagersystem zu bauen
I LOVE this idea and would make copper golems more useful especially the idea in the comments ( check them out!)
YESSSSSSS MOJANGGGGG ADD MOREEEEEEE!!!!!
DO IT MOJANG
PULL A NIKE AND JUST DO IT

Defiantly, a way to take items back off the golem I can see as been helpful. as well as some kind of animation to indicate if a golems failed to sort. e.g. it's searched X number of chests without success, so returns to It's Copper chest and stomps it's feet and has a little tantrum.

I'd like to add a few more ideas to make them more efficient and useful in farms that produce a lot of loot

  1. Instead of opening one chest at a time, they should do the head spin thing to scan all the chests in a single swoop and go straight to the correct one.
  2. Scan range should always start from the copper chest, and not the golem
  3. Be able to carry a full stack of items (64 items)
  4. When they pick up items from the copper chest, they need to pick up the first available item from multiple slots to capacity 
  5. Make the golems access more than 10 chests to make them viable in item storage vaults
  6. Golems should not idle if there are items in their copper chest
  7. They need better pathfinding and should avoid collision with other copper golems

trudat

I totally agree.
I do have to say this would be a really Really Good idea. Maybe You could use 1 goat horn, plus any amount of copper (1-8) to make one of 64 varients of copper horns.
Am besten dass man sein Pferd, Hund, Nautilus etc. mit verschiedenen Varianten rufen kann und dass man diese Kupferh√∂rner vielleicht bei einem Raid oder in einer Trial Chamber bekommt

This is an amazing idea! Happy Ghast plus new blocksets to make a cool home for Happy Ghast!

What if both soul variants? 

  • Soul sand behaves like sand - craft it into soul sandstone then give it the full stone blockset. Smelt it to get smooth soul sandstone and give it the full blockset. 
  • Soul soil behaves like nether brick - smelt 1 into a brick, combine 4, and give soul bricks a full block set matching nether bricks.

Now this leaves us with several interesting questions:

  • How is soul speed going to behave on this?
  • Should soul sand be a gravity block while soul soil isn't?
  • Should world-gen be updated to have layers of soul sandstone similar to the overworld? 
  • Smooth sandstone wall? 

Still, that's a lot of assets to add to the game.

Mojang be cooking with their updates and I'll be happy with what they deliver!

It should be 4 soul sand equals one soul sandstone, similar to normal sand and sandstone. Soul sandstone could, wild idea, it could slow time down when you walk on it, causing you and everything around you to move slower. Chiseled soul sandstone could display a picture of a ghast, similar to how normal chiseled sandstone shows a creeper and red chiseled sandstone shows a wither. Soul sand shouldn't fall like normal sand, as this would hinder the creation of the wither. Soul soil could be used with nether brick to craft soul bricks.
I love that idea, I hope they implement it.
and using the recovery compass should work just the same

Why one compass? When clicking on a lodestone, one compass can only track one lodestone. It would make more sense to only show that specific lodestone the compass is pointing to. If the player wanted to have more lodestones visible on the locator bar, they would have to carry more compasses (so not very different from the current state)

It would be cool if holden a compass in your hand not only points the dial in the right direction but if a point was also created on the Locator Bar for that location. For example, when you hold a compass in your hand (or off-hand) a point will appear on your Locator Bar that will point to 0,0.
It's likely 16 to balance the feature out so that it's not easy to exploit or 'too overpowered'
If the Copper Golem stack size does increase, there should be a way to slow it down so it doesn't overwhelm automated storage systems. Maybe more weathered golems could be slower?
As long as we can also turn it down or even off, not just add more.
that looks so terrible
Buena idea. Tambi√©n, gracias por dejarme practicar mi espa√±ol.
They used to have that i think. It was removed yrears ago
This is essential for MCPE as deleting the game completely deletes all the file along with our world.Mojan must consider this and add the Export world button for mcpe,atleast at the next minor update

Yeah, it really hurts to lose the world we've been playing in for so long, I hope mojang will add it later
-kzh
YES, the community need this !!!!
Good suggestion, but only if minecarts finally get some love as well.
It could be place on top boss bars instead of the experience bar which is more important
Second this! There's all that space at the top of the screen. No reason for it to merge with the XP bar.
The idea of a neutral sniffer is a cool idea! And it getting aggressive if you step too close to its flower is certainly cool! Maybe the sniffer could be tamed during daytime using the Eyeblossoms?
I do think there is room for more in the pale forest and pale garden biomes. Not sure if this is the best solution but I do agree there is room for improvement
100% agree

I agree, but only on how common it generates in soul sand valleys. The crafting recipe is the hardest way to get the dried ghast, because obtaining 8 ghast tears requires you to kill 16 ghasts on average without looting, and there is alway the risk that the tears will fall into fire/lava. The only players who can really take advantage of the recipe are ones with elytra and looting swords who would have to go look for new chunks with soul sand valleys in their old worlds.
Why do we need a crafting recipe if they are obtainable through bartering, killing ghasts is easy
Finding and bartering only please. I'm dubious about crafting: you might sell me on something like the iron golem mechanic but not on the crafting table grid!
Keep the crafting recipe, but slightly decrease the spawn rate.

I agree that it should not be craftable. It doesn't make sense to me to be able to craft a mob.
But to still make it accessible, it should spawn frequently in soulsand valleys, making a reason to travel there.
I get it is hard to obtain ghast tears for the crafting recipe, but it still feels somehow lazy to me.

It should be required to be found in the nether imo, the game is still lacking in reasons to explore and that would be a great reason to go out of your way to delve deep into the nether on a quest to find these. Would feel way more rewarding if this was the only way to acquire them.
Happy ghast must have his own armor
MMNNNHMMMM. THEY'RE SO LOUD!!!!

Didn't expect 2 out of three, especially the third part! Pretty happy with the little guys, but I was FLOORED when I realized how their hit box works. The antennae is entirely cosmetic?? I've been lied to, absurd.

It could store more potion of the same kind and would take up less inventory space than multiple bottles. We could get a copper spraybottle to spray potions at mobs like potions of harming. They could add rubber or resin to the game to use for the inside of the bottle in order to prevent negative reactions with the copperpatina and we could get a reactionchamber of sorts as an upgrade to the brewing stand which can corrupt potions using copper patina and another reactive substance you can get from monsterdrops for different corruption effects. 

Corruption effects: Guardian drops could be used to create a corruption effect that makes you breath underwater but drown while in air, the regular potions effect would be boosted as a result of adding something negative. Zombieflesh could make you hungrier quicker but the potioneffect boost would not be that much bigger. Creeper drops gunpowder and in the reactionchamber it would make the potion give an effect that ... can not think of anything right now. Anyone have more suggestions?
A√≠ o chato do meu amigo n√£o vai ver minha po√ß√£o de invisibilidade
another use for copper is always good
Wouldn't it make more sense for it to be a tinted glass bottle?

This is not possible because copper items are already stronger than in real life, as copper is a very soft metal that cant take high tension especially when using it as a pickaxe that would lead to many deformations

 

copper tools being stronger than iron is not only impossible, it doesnt make sense on a practical level because copper is more common than iron and oxidized copper actually slighty increases hardness of the copper even though its more brittle when oxidized
Adding this to the tools would also be great, that is, eliminating the use of honey in these tools.

"This is not possible because copper items are already stronger than in real life, as copper is a very soft metal that cant take high tension especially when using it as a pickaxe that would lead to many deformations

 

copper tools being stronger than iron is not only impossible, it doesnt make sense on a practical level because copper is more common than iron and oxidized copper actually slighty increases hardness of the copper even though its more brittle when oxidized" four words: diamond. pickaxe. Minecraft. logic.
yeah i agree but achievements should be uncollectable
The problem with that is on many consoles and mobile devices having multiple installations would eat up space...

You can fit 46,656 items in an Ender chest filled with 27 shulker boxes, each with 27 stacks of 64 items... how much bigger do you need! Mojang added shulkerboxes instead of a double ender chest back in 2016

I absolutely want to see a double ender chest.
Not everyone wants to use shulkerboxes to min-max the capacity of a single enderchest, as that will add an extra step in retrieval of any item. Plus shulker boxes are more end game of an item then enderchests.
yes double endechests plz
I do think a double ender chest would be cool but I just don't see it as necessary enough for Mojang to add
yes plz also add different chests for each wood type

How would it work, say you fill a double ended chest fully, you then can only access the first half of the items if you open a single chest, I like the idea of a bigger tender chest but the only way it would work is if they added more space in a regular end chest, shulker boxes are the way to go
This is a good idea but then it would create problems like what if you only place 1 ender chest instead of a late one?
While that would be cool, that also meanss they can leave your base
this seems really vague and pointless? there's also already a trademark green ore
Yeah if we can get three slots in the bundle but only one can be used for a stack of items, i feel like that would be really balanced.

I think an enchantment could help with this, but that is just how I would approach it.

I propose the enchantment name could be Collection.
Yeah and you should be able to do a speed boost by sprinting
Happy ghasts aren't meant for transportation, however they should be at least as fast as a walking player.
isn't there a "turbo mode" that already does this?

What about adding a snowball on a stick that when used (Right-click) increases the happy ghast's speed? This mechanic is already used within the game with the pig and the strider, and it will allow players to choose between different speeds for their ghast.

I agree. I just got my first Happy Ghast, and I wouldn't even consider it for building because transporting it even to wherever I would build would be a nightmare. Besides, we already have scaffolding which is cheap. The Happy Ghast was advertised to make transport of mobs and players easier and right now Nimbus (my ghasts name) is just sitting in his stall doing nothing. waste of my time and exploration getting this thing. The speed MUST be at least equivalent to sprinting speed. There are ways around this via commands and potions, but what if you made a world without cheats? You can't change it, and potions don't do much of anything. PLEASE MAKE THE GHAST FASTER.
This is true, the happy ghast is a great mob but players comment on its speed quite a lot. If this could be changed it would be very appreciated
Mojang plz
